In terms of singing experience, voice drills/exercises are quite needed specifically for breathing techniques and benefits of improving vocal range needed in singing. This is especially true in any choir and a lot of singers too. So I honestly appreciate the fact that Watame became a vocal training teacher in her segment, as it can be beneficial to everyone really (and as a choir member, this is a surprise treat that she added it here since 9/21 WataUta as well).
